description: The Product Archetype - Essential properties that define a product
title: Product Schema

___subcategory.description: A Tag Archetype record to use as this record's subcategory

___images.description: Array of Image Archetypes related to this product

___condition.description: Condition of the product, e.g. New

___upc.description: The Universal Product Code of the product

___created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___price.description: Product price in cents as an integer (whole number)

____id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

___model.description: Model name or number of the product

___seller.description: The person or organization selling the product

___recurring_payment.description: Does this product require recurring payments, e.g. Subscriptions

___servant_id.description: The servant to whom this record belongs

___updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record

___audience.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this product's audience (e.g. Men, Women, Children)

___sale_price.description: Product price in cents as an integer (whole number)

___category.description: A Tag Archetype record to use as this record's category

___sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit of the product

____sid.description: Unique short identifier for this archetype record

___variations.description: Array of Product Archetypes that are considered variations of this Product
